```{r}
library(sqldf)
library(ggplot2)
library(Lahman)
```


#Extracting data

```{r}
query<-"select yearID, HR 
from Batting 
where playerID='ruthba01'"

result<-sqldf(query)
```


#Visualizing data

```{r}
ggplot()+
  #geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR), color='red')+
  geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR), color='green')+
  ggtitle("Babe Ruth's Homerun Totals During Career")+
  xlab("Year")+
  ylab("Homeruns")
```
